activities:
LabRoots is a website designed to facilitate networking among the professional scientific community based on individual scientific experience, discipline, and aptitude.  LabRoots is relevant for all
scientists within the fields of medicine, chemistry, physics, mathematics, engineering, computer sciences, earth and space sciences, and life sciences.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Biotechnology - (BTC)Health Care Services - (HCS)Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Laboratory Scientific Instruments - (LAB)
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the safe harbor framework or EU data protection authorities.
